item.description:
Sign up to distribute Ron Paul signs to local businesses near where you live.

Respond wtih your RSVP, the name and location of your local business area and the number of Ron Paul signs you will likely need. We'll get the signs to you so that you can ask your local retailier to place them in their store windows.

Now's the time to promote Ron Paul in your neighborhood....
item.name: Ron Paul Sign Distribution in Neighborhood Business Districts
